Review Text: Very cozy place. Friendly staff. We had a wonderful Dutch apple pie and fresh orange juice. Amazing both. Affordable prices. Nice to have a drink or hang out.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Went there on our 1st holiday in Europe (from Australia) back in November 2018. It was a fantastic place. I am doing another trip this year in April and I can't wait to go there again. Great atmosphere and the beers where beautiful. Great staff and food as well. üëçüëç

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Nice coffee bar. Good staff.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: we loved it Especially to the friendly staff.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Very nice bar. Staff are very social and friendly a great environment perfect for chilling and enjoying a beer. They have a big screen for watching football. Beer is not bad at all. The food looked and smelled great. They have outdoor seating which is perfect.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Loved our time at this bar!! We were visiting for the weekend and had to restrict ourselves from spending every night here. Percy and Justin are amazing bartenders/chefs/djs!! This would definitely be our local bar if we lived here.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Amazing place. Every minute spended there is full with positive emotions.Stuff is friendly.Verry good service.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Very nice, comfortable place not far from the Central Station, and a strange, warm feeling to it. The staff are lovely and very welcoming, the beer's good & bar food is fine for a reasonable price. A perfect stop on your way to or back from the Eastern parts of the city.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Absolutely brilliant place,amazing staff who are very welcoming and quick service from then, the owner and his dog are so good.Prices are good for what you get and the beer is fantastic .also the cheese and ham tostie is great.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Great bar just outside the bustling city centre. They have a good selection of beers, though not all of them are on the menu, best ask the bartender. The staff are friendly and helpful. The terrace looks out over Oosterdok and the Central Station.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Best pub ever

Name: Pollux
Review Text:
The best place in Amterdam for eat and drink a beer.
Si must try the sandwich of goat cheese, walnut and honey, is delicious.
The music is perfect!
The owner is a wonderful woman!

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Just round the corner from the main tourist areas and sure, it's on a busy road but what a find. Friendly, warm, welcoming and even an indoor smoking room with comfy armchairs. Don't bother if you're expecting a traditional touristy pub but if you want to save some money and chill out I reckon it's hard to beat.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Well, the last time I visited this cafe was somewhere in 1978. Looking at the interior pictures not that much seems to have changed. Gives me good nostalgic feelings. Had a hell of time there during my merchant navy school time (Kweekschool voor de Zeevaart, RIP inmiddels). Good to see that place is still there. Loved it.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: A group of 9 of us Australians stumbled upon pollux one afternoon for a late lunch. Not only was the food great but we were greeted with a smile (and shots) and were even supplied jumpers (belonging to the owners husband) as a number of us ‚Ä¶

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Cozy and unpretentious little bar, with cheap easy snacks.. the staff are all very warm and friendly.. a little bit away from the maddening crowd of the inner city, they have a small stage for open mic/jam improv style gigs too.. very pleasant..

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Best (night) bar in our capital... good vibe, good service by beautifull peopleüòò

Name: Pollux
Review Text: This place is exactly what you want a neighborhood pub in Amsterdam to be. Its cozy, great selection of drinks, open late, awesome music and dancing, and the bartenders are super friendly and welcoming. The only problem was the ladies room ‚Ä¶

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Friendly bartenders, nice vibe...

Name: Pollux
Review Text: I was stuck on a business layover and went out by myself - this was the perfect spot.  Super friendly staff and locals.  Definitely a a party spot late night, but not in a seedy way at all.  Their smoked salmon selection is outstanding!

Name: Pollux
Review Text: 5 stars with closed eyes. Pollux is in my top 5 places in Amsterdam. Not so far away from this lovely place is my bus station. I never said before... I'm glad to miss my bus, time for pint in Cafe Pollux. See you there!

Name: Pollux
Review Text: The absolute nicest and generous waiters I've ever had the pleasure to meet, prices are good and their great sense of humor comes into addition to that. Add in good music and a cute dog and that's basically Caf√© pollux.

Review Text:

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Absolutely amazing people!! Super!! Good Gin, good music and good vibes. The owners and staff are so kind and friendly!! Could not ask for more. 5 stars, well deserved!!

Review Text: Craziest selection of music I've heard in any bar in the dam. Brilliantly staffed. Sorry photos unavailable.  But. Give it a try. Open until 4am.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: The bar that you would wanna go to more than once . I was in Amsterdam three days and went thrice. Beautifully friendly staff and a very relaxed place to just sit down.i lost my jacket here on the night of the new year, and 2 days later I have it back all cleaned up and smelling nice.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: This place is amazing. Such a great inclusive crowd. Be ready to dance if it‚Äôs a Saturday. Special thanks to Percy and Annie for making us feel welcomed.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Casual and comfortable place for a beer and a sandwich. Food and drinks are inexpensive, and though it‚Äôs not haute cuisine you‚Äôll be grateful for a burger or toasted sandwich and a relaxed atmosphere. Also convenient to the central train station.

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Super nice people and good mood :)

Name: Pollux

Name: Pollux
Review Text: Fritz and Helen are great owners and the staff, Percy, Jay, and Annie, that we met were awesome!  It IS the friendliest bar in Amsterdam, whether you are a tourist or a local.

Name: Pollux
